snippet.title: Once Upon a Puppet Teaser Trailer - Flatter Than Earth
snippet.description:
🎭 *Once Upon a Puppet: Official Teaser Trailer | Coming 2024* 🌟 *Wishlist Now on Steam!*

Dive into the enchanting world of Once Upon a Puppet, a 2.5D puzzle-platformer where theater and adventure intertwine. Watch our Official Teaser Trailer and get a glimpse of the magical journey that awaits in this captivating story of friendship, self-discovery, and redemption.

🔗 *Wishlist on Steam Now:* https://bit.ly/48JYl8v 

*About the Game:*
Once Upon a Puppet combines classic platforming with unique puppet-inspired gameplay. Set in a vibrant theatrical world, you'll control Nieve, a Stagehand exiled to the Understage, and Drev, a Puppet bound to her by magical strings. Together, they embark on a quest to return to the Frontstage, unraveling forgotten stories and uncovering shadowy secrets along the way.

*Release Date:* Coming in 2024

*Stay Connected:*
- 🌐 Visit our Official Website: https://www.flatterthanearth.com/ 
- 📣 Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/onceuponapuppet 
- 📸 Follow us on Instagram: https://instagram.com/onceuponapuppetgame 
- 👍 Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/onceuponapuppetgame 
- 👀 Follow us on TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@onceuponapuppet

Remember to like, comment, and subscribe to our channel for more updates! Your support means the world to us. 🌟

*Special thanks to @Evolve-pr for helping us with our trailer!*

#OnceUponAPuppet #PuzzlePlatformer #Gaming #IndieGames #SteamGames #gametrailers #indies #indiegame #comingsoon #newgames #pcgaming #puzzlegame #theatre
